title: How Ethical Is 'The Vanishing at the Cecil Hotel'?
description:
Amelia Wedemeyer and Claire McNear pose a few questions about the ethics of 'Crime Scene: The Vanishing at the Cecil Hotel,' a Netflix true crime series that chronicles the disappearance of Elisa Lam.

Hosts: Amelia Wedemeyer and Claire McNear
